output_list.reason: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
Integer overflow in burnFrom function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
transferFrom function allows asset theft due to incorrect computations of allowance.
sell function generates a random value, allowing attackers to always win the game.
buy function allows attackers to acquire tokens for free, due to incorrect access control on sellPrice.
